categories: Category:Battles of the Dark Nest Crisis

nodes.text: A battle at Thyferra was an early conflict of the Swarm War.

A team of Jedi Knights were sent to Thyferra to ensure its loyalty to the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances. However, held up by Gilad Pellaeon's forces and were unable to prevent the Killiks and black membrosia-addicted Vratix from launching a coup and taking over both the planet and the galaxy's supply of bacta. The Battle of Thyferra was the only successful Killik coup.
